item.title: Intro to Pragmatic Programmer
item.description: What is Pragmatic? Pragmatic is the behavior of a person that prioritizes practical rather than theoretical. Becoming a pragmatic programmer could make the difference between any other programmer. Pragmatic programmers determine by how the attitudes, styles, and how to solve problems. Being pragmatic not only distinguishes you from any other programmers but also makes decision making and adaptability of a person better. Responsibility is Important Being someone responsible is one of the best ways to become a better person.
